name: Disney's Donald Duck: Goin' Quackers
notes: Select English as the installer language. Otherwise this script will fail. Tested with a German CD

task.description: Installing Game. You have to use English as the installer language (You will be able to change the game language afterwards) and please don't change the installation directory!
task.name: wineexec

task.description: Installing Indeo and setting the Windows version to XP. No manual action is required.
task.name: winetricks

content:
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Disney Interactive/Donald Duck/Donald.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: DONALDAG.GID
- task:
    description: Disk Found. Creating 32bit Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Game. You have to use English as the installer language
      (You will be able to change the game language afterwards) and please don't change
      the installation directory!
    executable: $DISC/setup/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
- task:
    app: --unattended winxp icodecs
    description: Installing Indeo and setting the Windows version to XP. No manual
      action is required.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 800x600
